title: Enhancing Instructional Design Practical Competencies: "Hanja Structure Expedition": Gamified Hanja Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of alphabetic writing systems and fundamental digital device manipulation skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the meanings and structural principles of 10 basic Chinese character radicals (部首)
Learners can visualize and represent the formation principles of 20 basic Chinese characters through graphic mapping
Learners can maintain motivation for learning Chinese characters by completing five or more collaborative tasks with peers using gamification tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
